item.title: This helps you add Mining XP, now that i figured it out
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

i know lol, got lazy there
but i got it :]

addSkillXP((600 * mining[3]), playerMining); addItem(mining[4], 1); sendMessage("You get some ores.");

but, if ya look at it like this, i found that on my own
i added the XP on my own
i did this on my own
LOL
i just had a crazy idea it’d be around the getting ores message
thanks for your help and time :]

Read full topic

item.title: This helps you add Mining XP, now that i figured it out
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

back, but gotta get a shower[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 06:02:58 PM[/size][hr]thx guys, no errors
i’ll check it after shower[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 06:04:53 PM[/size][hr]no errors…but doesn’t work…

which should i use and which should be changed…

case 2091: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)); { setAnimation(625); addItem(436, 1); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[14]), 14); sendMessage("You start Mining the rock.. You get some Copper Ore!"); { } }

if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("minecopper")) { addSkillXP((18000*playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(436, 1); }

Here, there’s a case I just customly made. It’s not based on an AFK system thingy though, I think the other one is. You have to click it each time, meh, Idk. Mining emote, 200 Mining experience and a little message.

Add it underneath
